name: Save The World (Oskiek)
description:
Evil King wants to freeze the entire world! You have to stop him!

Experience an adventure! Fight the evil in a new pixel-art styled game! 

What does the game offer?

  • A great adventure!
  • Various locations!
  • Classic, Gameboy inspired art!
  • Various missions!
  • And more...

Follow now, make sure to not miss the release!
